definition: third of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/third in order/letter "C" or Roman "III" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 165°/propyl

sentences.english: Inorganic salts were found to promote the allylation reaction of carbonyl compounds with allyl bromide.
sentences.chinese: 研究了无机盐促进的羰基烯丙基化反应。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the anti-inflammatory effects of 3,4-oxo-isopropylidene-shikimic acid (ISA).
sentences.chinese: 目的研究异亚丙基莽草酸的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: Thus, the reaction with aryl-substituted allylic carbonates is regioselective.
sentences.chinese: 因此，与芳基取代的烯丙基碳酸反应选择性。

sentences.english: Chlorination occurs adjacent to the isoprene units to form allylic chlorines.
sentences.chinese: 氯化发生在异戊二烯单元附近形成烯丙基氯。

sentences.english: The waxy corn starch was used to produce the hydroxypropylated starch with freeze-thawing stabilization.
sentences.chinese: 用糯玉米淀粉制备冻融稳定型羟丙基淀粉。

sentences.english: These peaks correspond to side-chain cleavage of the ethyl and propyl groups respectively.
sentences.chinese: 这些峰分别相当于乙基和丙基的侧链开裂。

sentences.english: Diisopropyl ether(DIPE)is a new kind of oxygenated anti knock additive for gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 二异丙基醚是一种新的汽油含氧化合物抗爆添加剂。

sentences.english: Hydroxypropylated tapioca starch with high substitution solution had shear-thinning nature.
sentences.chinese: 高取代度羟丙基淀粉溶液具有剪切稀化性质。

sentences.english: Particularly preferred are hydroxypropyl trimonium quaternized glucose or fructose.
sentences.chinese: 尤其优选的是羟丙基三甲基铵季铵化的葡萄糖或果糖。

sentences.english: Evidence of the propyl radicals existing during the reaction was presented.
sentences.chinese: 本研究还提供了该反应涉及丙基自由基的证据。

definition: cyclopentene C5H8 (ring of five carbon atoms)
cyan/cyanide radical -CN, stable triple bond with chemical properties like halogens
